page.shortlink: api client api a5 ink background settings object
page.description: Definition of the ink page background.

property.name: save
property.description: Whether or not to save the background in the ink when it is committed. It can be useful to not save the background in the ink if the background image is being stored elsewhere.

property.name: color
property.description: CSS color to use in the background of the page.

property.name: image
property.description: Image to put in the background of the ink.

property.name: data
property.description: The data (URL) for the background image.

property.name: size
property.description: The size for that background image. Can be a string with the value of "cover" to have the image cover the ink, or "contain" to have the image contained inside the page.

property.name: width
property.description: The width in "ink units" to make the image.

property.name: height
property.description: The height in "ink units" to make the image.

property.name: position
property.description: Where to position the image in the background of the page. Options are "center", "top", "left", "right", "bottom", "top left", "top right", "bottom left" and "bottom right".
